document.full_text: newell rubbermaid, the maker of sharpie pens and plastic storage containers, cut its full-year profit forecast friday on slumping consumer spending, setting off a 12 percent decline in its share price.
document.title: business briefing | consumer goods: rubbermaid cuts its full-year profit forecast
lines_and_colors: newell rubbermaid, the maker of sharpie pens and plastic storage containers, cut its full-year profit forecast friday on slumping consumer spending, setting off a 12 percent decline in its share price.
